tablets.translation: Speak magic words and unlock the door
tablets.notes: lók-te: speaks/is speaking (present tense), ort: magic, mo: word/noun, ex-por: open/unlocked, apér-ter: door

tablets.text: Vaglemle vit trak vit esh an-inie tú ánte lem-de vía
tablets.translation: Wandering shard to shard and leaving nothing but destruction in his wake
tablets.notes: vaglemle: wandered, vit: glass, trak: to/toward/for/unto, esh: and, an-inle: smash/destroy (past), tú: all, ánte: among/enter/in/into/within, lem-de: his/her/its/their, vía: path/course/road

tablets.translation: Destroying those shards when he arrives
tablets.notes: an-inie: smash/destroy (past), lem-múr: everyone/those, vit: glass, lem-de: his, tim-por: arrive time

tablets.text: Estte ánte ista ter intes ter-múr
tablets.translation: Be among this place between worlds- (the tablet is damaged)
tablets.notes: est-te: be/exist/is/are (present), ánte: among/enter/in/into/within, ista: this, ter: place, intes: between, ter-múr: world

tablets.translation: Certainly back to the red doors quickly
tablets.notes: ker-de: to be sure/certainly, do: back, rú: red, apér-ter: door, rap: current/quick/urgent/now
an: negate/not/none/no, vas-wisle: great knowledge/ultimate wisdom (past), lem-de: his/her/its/their, timte: waiting/timing, trak: to/toward/for/unto

tablets.translation: In the cave below the first city
tablets.notes: te: present tense/in, túrn: cave, des-de: below, pri: one/unity/first, op: city/town

tablets.translation: Do not search within his home
tablets.notes: an: negate/not/none/no, vestte: search (present), lem-de: his/her/its/their, ánte: among/enter/in/into/within, reg: home/house

tablets.text: Wis-quaste lem-de jux sol lókte mo apérte
tablets.translation: Know their danger but speak the word to open

tablets.translation: See the path that will be death, there is a ghost's purpose

tablets.translation: Know their danger but speak the word ghost
